name: Turn it on
description:
Turn it on is a 2D Puzzle Game where you have to click on the electrical outlets in order to restore the power and turn on the lamp.

This game is only playable with the mouse and the keyboard.

CONTROLS :

 - Arrow keys or WASD to move.

-Left click to interact.

TOOLS USED :

 - Unity (2020.3.15f2 Version)

 - Krita

 - Sound mixing software

DEVELOPER :

Maëlys EDERN itch.io

This game  was made for One Minute Game jams #1.
